item.description:
Update: Please upload a Photo of YOUR FACE so Natalia, Audrey, Sameer & I can recognize you when you walk in to Starbucks and give you a seat!!!!!Please maintain your own bill.

 

 

 

The hosts will be helping to facilitate conversation.

Hello all, This Meetup is the regular  informal conversation group meeting, at Starbuck's in the Back Bay. Please print and bring a "Meetup" sign so that you can recognize each other more easily! Meetup Sign: At the top of this page, underneath the "Boston English as a Second Language Group", click on the word "More" then click on the second word down, "Files" you will see two documents, one is the Meetup tabletop sign to print. I hope its helpful! There are usually seats open at the large table near the front, or you can pull some smaller tables together. Please introduce yourselves and feel free to ask for help from each other. It is usually helpful if everyone starts with one conversation partner and then changes partners after 15 or 20 minutes! Have fun! and if you'd like to host a conversation meeting somewhere, please choose a date, location and time, email Reece and I will email the group! Thanks :)
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Boston ESL Signs on the tables

group.name: The Boston English as a Second Language Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston English as a Second Language Meetup Group Monthly Meetup
